response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in efficiency and quality. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to both us and you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional product. This offer allows us to maintain a fair transaction while ensuring you receive the best deal possible. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you need any further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 9500}
